data.comment: Today's referee, Marco Di Bello, has blown to start the match.
Roma have a goal kick.
In the minute 3, Edin Dzeko is on target to give Roma a 0-1 advantage.
Great play from Henrikh Mkhitaryan to set up the goal.
Free kick for Roma in their own half.
In the minute 5, Marco Di Bello signals a free kick to Atalanta.
Roma awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in Atalanta.
In the minute 8, Free kick Atalanta.
In Bergamo a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Leonardo Spinazzola (Roma) gets in a great strike – straight into the post! Ohhhh so close!
In the minute 9, It's a goal kick for the home team in Bergamo.
Throw-in for Roma in their own half.
Ball safe as Roma is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 12, Free kick for Atalanta in the half of Roma.
Roma awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Marco Di Bello awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 16, Marco Di Bello signals a Atalanta throw-in in Roma's half.
Throw-in for Roma at Gewiss Stadium.
Corner awarded to Roma.
In the minute 20, It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Atalanta close to the penalty box.
Throw-in for Roma in their own half.
Marco Di Bello awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 24, Free kick Roma.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Antonio Mirante.
Antonio Mirante is back on the pitch.
In the minute 26, Atalanta will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Roma.
Can Atalanta get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Roma's half?
Marco Di Bello signals a free kick to Atalanta in their own half.
In the minute 32, Atalanta have been awarded a corner by Marco Di Bello.
Atalanta's Marten De Roon is on target but unsuccessful.
Atalanta awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 34, In Bergamo, Ruslan Malinovskyi of Atalanta is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Atalanta have been awarded a corner by Marco Di Bello.
Can Atalanta capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
In the minute 35, Lorenzo Pellegrini for Roma has been booked by Marco Di Bello and receives a first yellow card.
Ruslan Malinovskyi (Atalanta) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Free kick for Roma in their own half.
In the minute 37, Ruslan Malinovskyi (Atalanta) gets a yellow card.
Marco Di Bello signals a free kick to Roma in their own half.
In the minute 39, Ball safe as Atalanta is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Cristian Romero (Atalanta) has received a yellow card from Marco Di Bello.
Roma awarded a free kick in their own half.
Roma's Lorenzo Pellegrini has run offside.
In the minute 41, Atalanta push forward at Gewiss Stadium and Robin Gosens gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Roma defence.
Throw-in Roma.
Atalanta's Ruslan Malinovskyi gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Roma defender.
In the minute 43, Attention is being given to Roma’s Roger Ibanez and play has been suspended briefly.
Roma’s Roger Ibanez is on his feet again at Gewiss Stadium.
3 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Marco Di Bello signals a free kick to Roma just outside Atalanta's area.
Roma drives forward and Lorenzo Pellegrini gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Corner awarded to Roma.
In the minute 45, Roma are coming forward and Pedro gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Goal kick for Atalanta at Gewiss Stadium.
Can Atalanta capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Roma's half?
In the minute 45, The first-half has ended.
Marco Di Bello has blown to start the second-half.
Josip Ilicic is replacing Matteo Pessina for Atalanta at Gewiss Stadium.
In the minute 46, Gian Piero Gasperini (Atalanta) is making a second substitution, with Jose Luis Palomino replacing Cristian Romero.
Marco Di Bello awards Atalanta a goal kick.
Atalanta's Ruslan Malinovskyi misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 48, Ball goes out of play for a Roma goal kick.
Atalanta awarded a free kick in their own half.
In Bergamo a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 53, Throw-in for Roma in the half of Atalanta.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Pedro for Roma who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Jordan Veretout for Roma drives towards goal at Gewiss Stadium. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 55, Marco Di Bello signals a free kick to Atalanta in their own half.
Roma's Pedro is back in action after a slight knock.
Free kick for Atalanta in their own half.
In the minute 56, Free kick for Roma in their own half.
Antonio Mirante (Roma) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Throw-in for Atalanta at Gewiss Stadium.
In the minute 59, Duvan Zapata gets an equalizer for Atalanta. The score is now 1-1.
That's a fine assist from Josip Ilicic.
Atalanta awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 63, Atalanta have a dangerous throw-in.
Free kick in a good position for Atalanta!
Gianluca Mancini (Roma) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 65, Roma awarded a free kick in their own half.
Roma make their first substitution with Bruno Peres replacing Leonardo Spinazzola.
Throw-in for Atalanta in their own half.
In the minute 67, Marco Di Bello blows against Atalanta's Robin Gosens for offside.
Marco Di Bello signals a free kick to Roma in their own half.
Atalanta are in shooting range from this free kick.
In the minute 70, Remo Freuler of Atalanta smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Atalanta move into a 2-1 lead through a Robin Gosens header.
Josip Ilicic instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 71, Marco Di Bello awards the away team a throw-in.
Atalanta take a comfortable 3-1 lead thanks to Luis Muriel.
The home team replace Duvan Zapata with Luis Muriel.
Important block from the Roma defence as Luis Muriel fires in a strike for Atalanta.
In the minute 74, Bryan Cristante is replacing Pedro for the away team.
Throw-in Atalanta.
In the minute 77, In Bergamo Atalanta drive forward through Robin Gosens. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In Bergamo, Ruslan Malinovskyi of Atalanta is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Throw-in for Roma close to the penalty box.
In the minute 79, Atalanta awarded a free kick in their own half.
Marco Di Bello signals a free kick to Roma.
Carles Perez is on a sub for Lorenzo Pellegrini for Roma.
In the minute 81, Paulo Fonseca is making the team's fourth substitution at Gewiss Stadium with Gonzalo Villar replacing Jordan Veretout.
The home team have replaced Ruslan Malinovskyi with Aleksey Miranchuk. This is the fourth substitution made today by Gian Piero Gasperini.
Marco Di Bello awards Atalanta a goal kick.
In the minute 83, Marco Di Bello signals a free kick to Roma in their own half.
Atalanta needs to be cautious. Roma have an attacking throw-in.
Josip Ilicic puts the ball in the net and the home team extend their lead. The score-line now reads 4-1.
In the minute 85, Hans Hateboer with an assist there.
Roma have a goal kick.
Ball safe as Atalanta is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 89, The home team replace Robin Gosens with Johan Mojica.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 4-1.
